content:
the Eagles are trying to bounce back from a disappointing loss to IUPUI Wednesday in which they blew a doubledigit first half lead PERIOD

Although the Eagles shot . percent from the field and knocked down eight 3pointers they were outrebounded  and outhustled for the vast majority of the second half PERIOD

The Eagles were outrebounded by doubledigits and coughed up a 14point lead to Horizon League foe IUPUI in a stunning and disjointed home loss the first of the year for Jim Christians squad PERIOD
